document.full_text: a story line in wednesday night's "south park" about the inherent meaninglessness of awards was just about the comedy awards, and not about the tonys. right?
document.title: and the award for biting the hand that feeds it goes to: 'south park'
lines_and_colors: a story line in wednesday night's "south park" about the inherent meaninglessness of awards was just about the comedy awards, and not about the tonys. right?
